name: Learning process general equation
description:
In one theory :
y : cost
x : unit number we want to calculate the cost
a : cost associated with the first unit produced
b : negative value --> reflect that unit costs decrease as production quantity increases

name: Elementary CER of order 1
description: Polynomial of order 1 also known as the straight line

name: Production rate general equation
description:
Y = Hours/unit (or constant dollars per unit)
A = First unit hours (or constant dollars per unit)
X = Unit number
b = Slope of the curve related to learning
Q = Production rate (quantity produced during the period)
r = Slope of the curve related to the production rate.
